title: Mobile Microlearning-Based Short-Term Course on Weld Pool State Recognition Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of welding processes and mobile device utilization skills
context.additional_context: A domain-specific language education program conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can identify key features of weld pool microimages with 90% accuracy.
Learners can classify weld pool states with 95% confidence using a model incorporating transfer learning techniques.
Learners can interpret weld quality information with 85% accuracy through feature map analysis of CNN-based models.

resources: Lightweight deep learning model visualization tool
Simplified ROI (Region of Interest) extraction interface
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
